tag.colourfulclocks.clock_hand.descripti: A stylish metal clock that can be viewed in your hand.
tag.colourfulclocks.clock_pendulum.descr: A single part of a grandfather clock that fits in its trunk.
tag.colourfulclocks.clock_base.descripti: A block that can be used as the base of a grandfather clock.
tag.colourfulclocks.clock_trunk.descript: A block that can be used as the middle section of a grandfather clock. Glass panes can be used on this block to show off its pendulum.
tag.colourfulclocks.clock_dial.descripti: A block that can be used as the top section of a grandfather clock.
